OHBM 2006


This collection organizes posters from NISOx and NISOx collaborators at the 2006 Human Brain Mapping (HBM) conference.

Talks

This section lists OHBM 2006 standalone talks by NISOx and NISOx collaborators.
  • Inference in Weird Spaces: MEG Meshes & White Matter Skeletons
    Author: Thomas Nichols. doi:10.6084/m9.figshare.5627542.v1

Posters

This section lists posters submitted to OHBM 2006 by NISOx and NISOx collaborators.
  • Combining Suprathreshold Average Voxel Intensity and Cluster Extent with Permutation Test Framework Authors: Hui Zhang, et al. doi:10.6084/m9.figshare.5627560.v1
  • Inference on Individual Differences in Functional Imaging: A test for correlations among tasks Authors: Sumitra Purkayastha, et al. doi:10.6084/m9.figshare.5630023.v1
  • Guidelines for Presenting Methods and Results in Neuroimaging Authors: Thomas Nichols, et al. doi:10.6084/m9.figshare.5630026.v1
  • Power Calculations for Group fMRI Studies Accounting for Arbitrary Design and Temporal Autocorrelation Authors: Jeanette Mumford and Thomas Nichols. doi:10.6084/m9.figshare.5630029.v1

Oxford Big Data Institute at the University of Oxford
